thread.title: British Fashion Awards Nominations Announced
thread.title_full: British Fashion Awards Nominations Announced -- The Cut

author: Diana Tsui
title: British Fashion Awards Nominations Announced
text:
Because fashion people love nothing more than to celebrate something, this year's British Fashion Council Awards nominees were announced today. On top of the list is J.W. Anderson , who happens to be having a pretty good year. Besides having a hit bag under his belt at Loewe , he's earned nods for his work both on his namesake men's and women's lines. He'll face Victoria Beckham , who was nominated for the brand award last year, and Christopher Kane .
Tom Ford is on the red-carpet designer nominees list, going up against Christopher Kane, Erdem , and Roksanda . Burberry is up for both the creative campaign and brand awards. But one person seems to be missing: Cara Delevingne, who's probably too busy going after her acting career to care.
The awards will be presented on Monday, November 23, and they'll be hosted by comedian Jack Whitehall. Also on deck to be presented: BFC Outstanding Achievement, British Style, International Designer, and the Isabella Blow Award for Fashion Creator. Read ahead for the full list.
